`causalwiz` is an R package for causal inference analysis. It provides functions for estimating treatment effects using various statistical methods, features built-in plotting functions an utilities designed for causal inference workflows in R.

The package is accompanied by a series of <a href="../../posts.html" class="cool-link">Italian-language articles</a>, covering 
theoretical foundations of causal inference and the practical implementation of methods in `causalwiz`. <a href="https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz" class="cool-link">Web-based package documentation</a> is also available.

## Installation

You can install the package via Github repository:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("carminemnc/causalwiz")
```
